name: Exile's Path
text: A lifetime spent shunned by others and eschewing your heritage makes you resistant to efforts to pry inside of your mind.
benefit: Once per day, when you fail a Will save against an enchantment spell or effect, you may reroll that saving throw, but must take the reroll result even if it’s worse.
text_zh: 一直以来被躲避他人，并努力逃避自身血脉的经历，使你对窥视你内心的效果产生了抗力。
benefit_zh: 每天1次，如果你在一次对抗惑控系法术或效果的意志豁免中失败，那么你能够重骰豁免检定，但是你必须接受第二次结果，即使结果更差。
